32 class Image: public Resource{
33 public:
34  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
37 
39  static QPixmap SetPixmapColor(const QPixmap& pixmap, const Color& color);
40 
42  static uint32_t GetPixelBitCount(QImage::Format fmt) {
43  if (fmt == QImage::Format_Invalid) {
44  Logger::Throw("Error, unsupported pixel format");
45  }
46  else if (fmt > QImage::Format_BGR888) {
47  Logger::Throw("Unrecognized image format");
48  }
49  return (uint32_t)s_pixelByteCounts[(size_t)fmt];
50  }
51

53  static void Image::Convert32bitARGBtoRGBA(Image& image);
54  static void Image::Convert32bitRGBAtoARGB(Image& image);

83  return ResourceType::kImage;
